name: Hell's Casino
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022. WELCOME TO HELL'S CASINO. Synopsis:

You're trapped in hell and must traverse the casino, activating locks and opening doors. Watch out, those little demons want your flesh! 

Can you escape? Try now!

Controls:

Use WASD to Move.

Arrow keys to shoot Dice.

The Dice on screen will constantly change from 1 - 6 and you must time the correct number to shoot that dice. Some objects can be manipulated by shooting dice at them.

Get to the end and defeat the boss.

Game has an in-game timer so be sure to post your time below and see who can get the fastest!

I really wanted to add more objects that could be manipulated by the dice rolls, like a bridge that lengthens depending on the dice number etc but I just didn't have time sadly! :(

If you can think of any cooler ideas for what the dice could have been used to change then share them in the comments and who knows, maybe I'll add them at a later point!

Follow me on Twitter if you have fun: https://twitter.com/StasisHeroDev

You can also check out the main video game I'm currently working on at https://stasishero.com
